title: Platinum
body: Work with top-level creatives, plus agency-style brand validation
footer: By bundling your name and Logo project you save $50 off the standard price of $598.

title: Managed
body: A full agency experience without the agency price tag
footer: Receive optimum results from your Platinum Contest by launching a Managed Contest Package and working one-on-one with an experienced Squadhelp Branding Consultant. With significantly more validation services, professional brief creation, and daily management of your contest by your Branding Expert, you'll receive an enhanced branding experience to closeout your branding project. Learn More about Managed Contest Service
